Hi Greg, George,
actually that is an interesting question whether it can be considered  
diffusing. a lensplate strays light, but it is not diffuse (if it was  
it had to look white from below). Still it may be a valid approach to  
treat it as diffuse in a model.
Cheers
Lars.
